#include<iostream>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while(T--)
    {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        if(n==4)
            cout << 0 << endl;
        else if(n<7)
            cout << -1 << endl;
        else
        {
            while(n%7!=0 && n>7)
            {
                n-=4;
                
            }
            (n%7==0)?cout<<n<<endl:cout<<-1<<endl;
        }
    }
}
